Body:
I tried to publish message writing code,

MyService.pubnub.publish().channel(birdpeek").message("{"rlysw":{"0":1}}").async(new PNCallback<PNPublishResult>()

But the android returns error by turning red

I even put \" and it turns green out of blue but problem is what got on pubnub console the message is Sat Nov 12 2016 18:57:40:592 : <birdpeek> "{\"rlysw\":{\"0\":1}}". What proper statement i should have inserted i need advise. And here's the json object i wanna publish

You should just publish the json object. The SDK will do the conversion on the hood for you. Use the following code to properly build the object.

Map<String, Map<String, Object>> payload = new HashMap<>();	Map<String, Object> innerPayload = new HashMap<>();	innerPayload.put(0"

It really works. Great! Really appreciate it Eric. Thx for the attention. BTW I can't find this tips stated in any of the doc write up in pubnub website and this format is highly necessary. I think you should hv others let know and have included it too.
